UPDATE.CLOSE_THE_APP_TO_UPDATE: Close completely the app or the browser to install the update

AUTH.REGISTER_A_NEW_ACCOUNT_TO_THE_SYSTEM: Register a new account to the system
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_CONFIRMATION_LINK: Haven't received the confirmation link yet?
AUTH.RESEND_CONFIRMATION_LINK_HINT: Insert your username and we will send you another code at the email address you provided us; please check also your SPAM folder
AUTH.PASSWORD_POLICY_VIOLATION: The password must be at least {{ n }} characters long
AUTH.REGISTRATION_COMPLETED: Registration completed; confirm your email to login
AUTH.CONFIRM_YOUR_EMAIL_TO_LOGIN: Before to login you have to confirm the email address you provided; check in your inbox or into the SPAM folder
AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_HINT: Type in your email to request a password reset
AUTH.CHANGE_THE_PASSWORD_HINT: Note: the password should consist of {{ n }} characters or more
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_A_RESET_CODE: Haven't received the reset code yet?
AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_CODE_SENT: The code to reset the password has been sent via email
AUTH.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Password changed! Now you can sign in again
AUTH.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_ERROR: User not found, code not correct or password too short
AUTH.YOU_NEED_TO_CHOOSE_A_NEW_PASSWORD: Choose a new password for your account
AUTH.PRIVACY_POLICY_CHECK_REGISTRATION: By creating a new account, you declare to accept the following
AUTH.PRIVACY_POLICY_CHECK_LOGIN: By logging in, you declare to accept the following

CUSTOM_FIELDS.CHOOSE_A_KEY: Choose a name for the field
CUSTOM_FIELDS.DUPLICATED_KEY: A field with that name already exists
CUSTOM_FIELDS.NAME: Name
CUSTOM_FIELDS.FIELD_DELETION_ALERT: The field will be irreversibly deleted

OFFLINE.ERROR_DURING_LAST_SYNC: There was an error during the last synchronization; please try again.
OFFLINE.UPLOAD_QUEUE_REQUESTS_EXPLANATION: The actions created offline must be uploaded online
OFFLINE.DOWNLOAD_RESOURCES_EXPLANATION: List of the resources available when offline
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED: Request failed; try again or delete it
